Text: Yes, its ripped from the disks.

@kid83, 
Put css2.cab, css3.cab and css4.cab in the disc 1 folder, then run setup.exe again, this also worked for me!

Servers for all the games at

http://css.setti.info/servers/css/ - CS:S
http://css.setti.info/servers/dods/ - DoD:S
http://css.setti.info/servers/hl2mp/ - HL2 DM

Install the masterserver if you want the server list in-game (recommended).
